comments.text:
Created attachment 509480
sample html

After landing Bug 541656,

In caret browsing mode, Status overlay covers the caret

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Start Minefield with new profile
2. Open attached html
3. Enable caret browsing mode Press F7
4. Move caret to the bottom-left of view port


Actual Results:  
 The caret is covered by Status overlay

Expected Results:  
 Shuld not. 
 Anchor url and the caret should be visible both.
